At the end of the day everything on this screen is just a colored pixel.

maybe add a small prelude abotu why i'm doing this, example:
Recently while working on a tool (maybe add that i will shocase later/ what the tool is about => it will probably be the gradient generator) I neded a color picker...
never done before so i tought I would note my struggles and create a blog post about what i find ecc...

<section>

## A word of caution
The blog post hasn't even started and I'm already here with a _warning_ <Emoji value="ðŸ¤¦" description="I'm embarassed"/>. Color pickers are usually displayed inside
a [Modal](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Modal_window) or a dropdown. Coding those components properly so that they have proper UX and behave as _expected_ 
is not trivial.

Being that this is not the main focus of this blog post, our `<ColorPicker>` will be coded as if it's always visibile. 

Also, this is not a tutorial _on_ React, some knowledge will be taken for granted.

</section>

<ColorPickerDemo />
